entry.def: If you believe in reincarnation, you believe that you will be reincarnated after you die.

example.ex: Many African tribes believe in reincarnation.
example.tran: 许多非洲的部落都相信人会转世。

entry.def: A reincarnation is a person or animal whose body is believed to contain the spirit of a dead person.

means.word_mean: 1. embodiment in a new form (especially the reappearance or a person in another form);

3. the Hindu or Buddhist doctrine that person may be reborn successively into one of five classes of living beings (god or human or animal or hungry ghost or denizen of hell) depending on the person's own actions
